  5. Communicate frequently and effectively with team members, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams to ensure alignment and smooth collaboration.

Must Haves

  1. Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or a related field;
  2. 5+ years of experience as a backend software engineer with a proven track record of delivering high-quality software;

  4. Knowledge about Git for version control and GitHub Actions for CI/CD workflows;
  5. Ability to work autonomously and thrive in an environment with high levels of uncertainty;
  6. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Nice to Haves

  1. Knowledge of Terraform for infrastructure-as-code to manage scalable cloud resources;

The Benefits of Joining Us

  1. Professional growth: Accelerate your professional journey with mentorship, TechTalks, and personalized growth roadmaps;

Next Steps After You Apply

The next steps of your journey will be shared via email within a few hours. Please check your inbox regularly and watch for updates from our Internal Applicant site, LaunchPod, which will guide you through the process.

title: SEO Account Manager for a Performance Marketing Agency
description:
SEO Account Manager for a Performance Marketing Agency

About the Company:
Pantelope is a performance marketing agency that specializes in paid search, paid social, and SEO. We are highly technical and collaborate effectively with other agencies and companies that have marketing departments and need technical assistance. We craft personalized digital strategies that truly resonate and make an impact. So, whether you're aiming to increase brand awareness, attract new customers, or boost your sales, we're here to turn those goals into reality.

About the Role:
We are seeking a motivated, experienced SEO Account Manager to lead and execute advanced SEO strategies for diverse clients. The ideal candidate is a confident decision-maker with exceptional organizational skills, able to thrive in a fast-paced environment. Success in this role requires clear communication, a proactive mindset, and a results-driven approach to improving organic performance.

We are looking for a SEO Account Manager specifically with these requirements:

  • Strong experience in SEO strategy development for diverse industries
  • Exceptional technical SEO knowledge, including performing audits and optimizing website structures
  • Advanced skills in keyword research, competitor analysis, and content strategy
  • Demonstrated ability to manage link-building campaigns and off-page optimization initiatives
  • Proficiency in analytics tools like Google Analytics, SEMrush, and Search Console
  • Exceptional written and verbal communication skills tailored for U.S. audiences
  • Proven track record of delivering results (e.g., traffic growth, improved rankings, and increased conversions)
  • Experience working in agencies or managing multiple clients simultaneously
  • Ability to thrive in collaborative, team-oriented settings and maintain professionalism and integrity

Your responsibility will include (but not limited to):

  • Developing and executing tailored SEO strategies aligned with client goals and industry trends
  • Conducting technical site audits, resolving issues, and ensuring alignment with best practices for structure, speed, and crawlability
  • Collaborating with content teams to create and optimize SEO-friendly copy, metadata, and internal linking structures
  • Managing outreach campaigns to secure high-quality backlinks and enhance domain authority
  • Utilizing company tools and systems (e.g., CRM, task management, analytics platforms) to track progress and performance
  • Monitoring SEO metrics, providing data-driven feedback, and refining strategies based on results and emerging trends
  • Acting as the primary point of contact for clients, ensuring clear communication of progress and next steps

Growth Opportunities/Perks:

  • Pathway to becoming SEO Director within the organization
  • Access to paid training and professional development resources
  • Collaborative and inclusive company culture
  • Equipment budget to support remote work efficiency

This Position Is Perfect For You If...

You are a Strategic Problem Solver.
You excel at analyzing complex challenges, prioritizing tasks, and creating SEO strategies that balance immediate client needs with long-term growth goals.

You are Detail-Oriented and Analytical.
You have a keen eye for detail and a strong grasp of technical SEO, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in audits, optimizations, and reporting.

You are Proactive and Results-Driven.
You are motivated to identify new opportunities, innovate workflows, and deliver measurable improvements in organic performance and client satisfaction.

Our hiring process is made up of five parts, so please be aware that you will need to dedicate time for a questionnaire, a video, and a few 1-on-1 interviews.

Thank you for taking the time to consider this position. We look forward to hearing from you soon!

Seniority level

Mid-Senior level

Employment type

Full-time

Job function

Marketing and Sales

Industries

IT Services and IT Consulting

title: Coordenador de S&OP
description:
Job description

A Baldan é uma empresa que promove permanentemente o desenvolvimento dos seus colaboradores e do meio onde atua.

Nossa vocação é levar aos clientes tecnologia e confiabilidade, desenvolvendo com excelência equipamentos e soluções inovadoras para a agricultura.

Buscamos assim pessoas comprometidas com nossos valores, dispostas a aceitar desafios para crescimento e inovação. Se você quer fazer a diferença, venha fazer parte do time Baldan.

Atualmente, estamos em busca de um profissional para a posição de Coordenador de S&OP.


Main responsibilities

  • Coordenar o processo de S&OP, administrando o planejamento de demanda e a capacidade de produção para garantir o equilíbrio entre oferta e demanda.
  • Facilitar a integração entre departamentos, promovendo a colaboração e a comunicação entre as áreas de vendas, produção, logística e finanças.
  • Elaborar e analisar projeções de demanda, utilizando dados históricos e tendências de mercado para projetar necessidades futuras.
  • Desenvolver e monitorar indicadores de performance (KPIs) relacionados ao S&OP, como níveis de estoque, atendimento de pedidos, e eficiência operacional.
  • Liderar reuniões mensais de S&OP, revisando o desempenho passado, ajustando projeções e planos, tomando decisões baseadas em dados.
  • Identificar e mitigar riscos, desenvolvendo planos de contingência para lidar com variações inesperadas na demanda ou na capacidade de produção.
  • Coordenar o desenvolvimento de ferramentas e processos, integrando novas tecnologias e metodologias que aprimorem o S&OP.
  • Permear todos os níveis da companhia e para construção de cenários e garantir o S&OE.
  • Realizar projeções de estoque e influenciar nas ações para o atingimento das metas.

Requirements and skills

O que esperamos de você:

Ensino Superior em Administração, Engenharia de Produção, Logística ou áreas correlatas.

Pós-graduação ou MBA em Supply Chain, Gestão de Operações, Planejamento Estratégico ou áreas afins.

Informática (Pacote Office, em especial Excel – fórmulas básicas, tabelas, tabelas dinâmicas, gráficos, macros etc.);

Power BI e PowerQuery;

Conhecimento e vivência no ciclo S&OP;

Conhecimentos em programação (VBA e Python).

description:
At BairesDev, we've been leading the way in technology projects for over 15 years. We deliver cutting-edge solutions to giants like Google and the most innovative startups in Silicon Valley.

Our diverse 4,000+ team, composed of the world's Top 1% of tech talent, works remotely on roles that drive significant impact worldwide.

When you apply for this position, you're taking the first step in a process that goes beyond the ordinary. We aim to align your passions and skills with our vacancies, setting you on a path to exceptional career development and success.

Delivery Manager at BairesDev

We are looking for a Delivery Manager to lead and manage a structure of 200+ professionals, including Project Managers, Scrum Masters, and Software Engineers, working for over 30 US-based clients. This is a high-impact role with limitless growth opportunities in the fastest-growing company in the world. Your leadership will ensure that KPIs are met, processes are adhered to, and operations run smoothly.

What You’ll Do:

  1. Lead and mentor teams of Project Managers, ensuring alignment with company goals and KPIs.
  2. Oversee Profit & Loss (P&L) responsibility and management control.
  3. Act as the escalation point for operational and delivery-related issues, ensuring prompt conflict resolution.
  4. Collaborate with the PMO on the execution of procedures for PMs, ensuring consistency and effectiveness.
  5. Work closely with HR Business Partners to enforce HR policies across the team.
  6. Monitor the performance of Project Managers, managing a team ranging between 5 and 10 PMs overseeing 200+ team members.
  7. Ensure efficient reporting and escalation methodologies to maintain smooth operations.
  8. Address HR-related matters with the HRBP and escalate relevant issues as needed.
  9. Present complex operational challenges to Account Managers (AMs) while supporting the relationship between PMs and clients.
  10. Ensure that communication between PMs and Clients is professional, clear, and effective.

What We’re Looking For:

  1. 4+ years of experience as a Delivery Manager, managing teams of 50+ people including 3+ PMs in the IT sector.
  2. Strong IT background and experience managing large-scale software development or tech projects.
  3. Excellent leadership, communication, and conflict-resolution skills.
  4. University degree.
  5. Advanced level of English.

Benefits:

  1. 100% remote work (from anywhere).
  2. Excellent compensation in USD or your local currency if preferred.
  3. Hardware and software setup for you to work from home.
  4. Flexible hours: create your own schedule.
  5. Paid parental leaves, vacations, and national holidays.
  6. Innovative and multicultural work environment: collaborate and learn from the global Top 1% of talent.
  7. Supportive environment with mentorship, promotions, skill development, and diverse growth opportunities.

Join a global team where your unique talents can truly thrive!
